testcase.name: HomeController GET should render the index page from the application

failure.message:
com.google.inject.ProvisionException: Unable to provision, see the following errors:
1) Error in custom provider, play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheExistsException: An EhCache instance with name 'play' already exists.
This usually indicates that multiple instances of a dependent component (e.g. a Play application) have been started at the same time.
at play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheModule$$anonfun$$lessinit$greater$1.bindCache$1(EhCacheApi.scala:79): Binding(interface net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache qualified with QualifierInstance(@play.cache.NamedCache(value=play)) to ProviderTarget(play.api.cache.ehcache.NamedEhCacheProvider@5a141856)) (via modules: com.google.inject.util.Modules$OverrideModule -> play.api.inject.guice.GuiceableModuleConversions$$anon$1) while locating net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache annotated with @play.cache.NamedCache(value=play) at play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheModule$$anonfun$$lessinit$greater$1.bindCache$1(EhCacheApi.scala:80): Binding(interface play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi qualified with QualifierInstance(@play.cache.NamedCache(value=play)) to ProviderTarget(play.api.cache.ehcache.NamedAsyncCacheApiProvider@499fe6a4)) (via modules: com.google.inject.util.Modules$OverrideModule -> play.api.inject.guice.GuiceableModuleConversions$$anon$1) while locating play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi annotated with @play.cache.NamedCache(value=play) while locating play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi for the 1st parameter of models.UserInfoRepo.<init>(UserInfoRepo.scala:10) while locating models.UserInfoRepo for the 2nd parameter of controllers.HomeController.<init>(HomeController.scala:18) at controllers.HomeController.class(HomeController.scala:18) while locating controllers.HomeController for the 2nd parameter of router.Routes.<init>(Routes.scala:29) while locating router.Routes while locating play.api.inject.RoutesProvider while locating play.api.routing.Router for the 1st parameter of play.api.http.JavaCompatibleHttpRequestHandler.<init>(HttpRequestHandler.scala:222) while locating play.api.http.JavaCompatibleHttpRequestHandler while locating play.api.http.HttpRequestHandler for the 6th parameter of play.api.DefaultApplication.<init>(Application.scala:236) at play.api.DefaultApplication.class(Application.scala:235) while locating play.api.DefaultApplication while locating play.api.Application

testcase.name: HomeController GET should render the index page from the router

failure.message:
com.google.inject.ProvisionException: Unable to provision, see the following errors:
1) Error in custom provider, play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheExistsException: An EhCache instance with name 'play' already exists.
This usually indicates that multiple instances of a dependent component (e.g. a Play application) have been started at the same time.
at play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheModule$$anonfun$$lessinit$greater$1.bindCache$1(EhCacheApi.scala:79): Binding(interface net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache qualified with QualifierInstance(@play.cache.NamedCache(value=play)) to ProviderTarget(play.api.cache.ehcache.NamedEhCacheProvider@42fc7481)) (via modules: com.google.inject.util.Modules$OverrideModule -> play.api.inject.guice.GuiceableModuleConversions$$anon$1) while locating net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache annotated with @play.cache.NamedCache(value=play) at play.api.cache.ehcache.EhCacheModule$$anonfun$$lessinit$greater$1.bindCache$1(EhCacheApi.scala:80): Binding(interface play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi qualified with QualifierInstance(@play.cache.NamedCache(value=play)) to ProviderTarget(play.api.cache.ehcache.NamedAsyncCacheApiProvider@3b23f3c7)) (via modules: com.google.inject.util.Modules$OverrideModule -> play.api.inject.guice.GuiceableModuleConversions$$anon$1) while locating play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi annotated with @play.cache.NamedCache(value=play) while locating play.api.cache.AsyncCacheApi for the 1st parameter of models.UserInfoRepo.<init>(UserInfoRepo.scala:10) while locating models.UserInfoRepo for the 2nd parameter of controllers.HomeController.<init>(HomeController.scala:18) at controllers.HomeController.class(HomeController.scala:18) while locating controllers.HomeController for the 2nd parameter of router.Routes.<init>(Routes.scala:29) while locating router.Routes while locating play.api.inject.RoutesProvider while locating play.api.routing.Router for the 1st parameter of play.api.http.JavaCompatibleHttpRequestHandler.<init>(HttpRequestHandler.scala:222) while locating play.api.http.JavaCompatibleHttpRequestHandler while locating play.api.http.HttpRequestHandler for the 6th parameter of play.api.DefaultApplication.<init>(Application.scala:236) at play.api.DefaultApplication.class(Application.scala:235) while locating play.api.DefaultApplication while locating play.api.Application
